text: Perimeter 81 is an Israeli cloud and network security company that develops secure remote networks, based on the zero trust architecture, for organizations. Its technology replaces legacy security appliances like VPNs and firewalls. Perimeter 81 completes $5 million funding round, Jerusalem Post, March 26, 2019 SonicWall leads $10m round in Perimeter 81, Globes, Yasmin Yablonko, 21 November 2019 ==History== The company was founded in 2018 by Sagi Gidali and Amit Bareket, founders of SaferVPN which was acquired by J2 Global. The SaferVPN network infrastructure, which was developed over six years, served as the basis for Perimeter 81’s initial product development. Based in Tel Aviv, Israel, the company raised 19.5 million dollars in three funding rounds during 2019-20, including investments from USA’s SonicWall (Francisco Partners), Toba Capital and Israel’s Spring Ventures. Secured network startup Perimeter 81 raises $4.5 million, Calcalist, Elham Nasser Eddin, 11 March 2020 In June 2020 it raised funds at 100 million dollars valuation. Perimeter81 raises funds at $100m valuation. Globes, Shiri Habib- Valdhorn, 16 Jun, 2020. In August 2020 it was completed a $40 million Series B financing round at a company valuation of $160 million. Perimeter 81 raises $40m at $160m valuationGlobes, Yasmin Yablonko, 11 August 2020. The company has hundreds of clients, among them Fortune 500 companies. ==Technology== The company develops a converged networking and security cloud edge delivered in a software as a service model. It offers global gateway deployment and multi- tenant management, allowing the distributed workforce to securely access company resources, whether these are located in the cloud or on-premises. Review: How Perimeter 81 provides a near plug-and-play network security service, John Breeden II, Insider Pro, August 13, 2019 Perimeter 81 offers its service through the Ingram cloud marketplace and has partnered with SentinelOne to deliver unified network and endpoint security. Perimeter 81 Partners with SentinelOne to deliver fully automated, zero trust network security and endpoint protection, Toolbox, Shruti Umathe, 2019 SonicWall invests in Perimeter 81, MSSP Alert, Joe Panettieri ,November 22, 2019 The company also partnered with SonicWall to incorporate cyber security and firewall features in its secure access service edge (SASE) platform. Perimeter 81 announces $10m Series A funding and SonicWall partnership, Eva Short, Silicon Republic, 21 November 2019 Perimeter 81 was chosen by Gartner as a “cool vendor in network and cyber-physical systems security”, Cool Vendors in Network and Cyber-Physical Systems Security , Gartner, 16 April 2019 selected by Frost & Sullivan as technology leadership award winner, Frost & Sullivan recognizes disruptive Industry leaders with its Best Practices Awards, Frost & Sullivan, July 15, 2019 recognized as one of the 500 fastest-growing tech companies by Deloitte Revolutionizing Network Security for the Mobile Workforce, Deloitte and chosen as a finalist in the Ingram micro comet competition. The company also won the cybersecurity vendor achievement of the year, a cybersecurity breakthrough award and was the finalist in the NYCx cybersecurity moonshot challenge, held by JVP, together with the New York Mayor’s office.
